nxt

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • nxt.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    a class for handling all the connection stuff between this PC and the NXT

    • Method Detail

      • conn

        protected void conn(int delay,
                    NXTComm nxtComm,
                    NXT nxt)
        this method connects to a specific NXT Brick
        Parameters:
        delay - the delay between sending different messages
        nxtComm - the NXTComm with the NXTInfo
        nxt - an Instance of the NXT Class

      • isConnected

        protected java.lang.Boolean isConnected()
        checks if the PC is connected to the NXT
        Returns:
        a Boolean

      • ping

        private double ping()
        this method pings the NXT
        Returns:
        the average ping time

      • getSystemMillis

        private long[] getSystemMillis()
        this method gets the SystemMillis of the NXT
        Returns:
        an long array, where the first value is the time of the NXT, the second one the time of this PC, when the answer of the NXT was received

      • doNotSend

        protected void doNotSend()
        this method sets a Boolean to not send the messages to the NXT

      • sendSyncMessage

        protected void sendSyncMessage(long runTime)
        this method is for sending synchronised messages
        Parameters:
        runTime - the time, when the commands should be executed

      • addRequest

        public void addRequest(NXTMessage nxtMessage,
                       RequestListener listener)
        this method requests some info from the NXT
        Parameters:
        nxtMessage - the request
        listener - the listener for the answer

      • replyReceived

        public void replyReceived(NXTMessage nxtMessage)
        this method notifies all listeners, if there's a reply for their answer
        Parameters:
        nxtMessage - the reply

      • handleButtons

        private void handleButtons(NXTMessage nxtMessage)
        this method handles the Buttons
        Parameters:
        nxtMessage - a NXTMessage
